channel.title: [pi] health and hits
channel.description: how do i make the hp go to 999 and there is automatic 10x hits plz!!!!! help me plz plz

item.title: [pi] health and hits
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Difficulty: 1/100
Classes Modified Client sided: Client.java
Classes Modified Server sided: PlayerAssistant.java
Tested Server: PI(Project Insanity)
Credits: 0% Mine, Copied and pasted it all.
100% to Thelife on R-S.
Requirements: Health orb

This is just adding a 0 after health.

[CLIENT SIDED]
Client.java

Search for:

In the method find:

and replace with this

And replace

if(health >= 75) colour = 65280; else if(health >= 50) colour = 0xffff00; else if(health >= 25)

with this

if(health >= 750) colour = 65280; else if(health >= 500) colour = 0xffff00; else if(health >= 250)

[SERVER SIDED]
PlayerAssistant.java

Search for:

Under

Add

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] health and hits
item.dc:creator: @soldierslim2 soldierslim2
item.description:
@soldierslim2 wrote:

[quote=“RuneScapeeer279, post:10, topic:413234”][quote author=tyyy9 link=topic=514705.msg3737244#msg3737244 date=1315050305]

[quote author=RuneScapeeer279 link=topic=514705.msg3736855#msg3736855 date=1315016434]

Your in luck, sorta this is what I found of it,

public boolean CalculateCriticalDamage(Client c) { int CriticalDamage = Misc.random(100); if (CriticalDamage > 99) return true; else return false;
I’m pretty sure it goes under player.java server sided, but im pretty sure its delta so if you know how to edit code to make it with PI do that, if not find some one smarter than me. Also, i didn’t write this so all i know is its for critical hit, what it does exactly, I wouln’t know, if it works, i wouldn’t know, so if you have problems with it, don’t ask me.
[/quote]Thats from Uncalled’s critical hit system, and It has nothing to do with 10x hits, that is part of the system he made so you have a 1% chance of dealing double damage.

Yes but there is a way to edit it to give 99% chance of critical hit
[/quote] Yes, change if (CriticalDamage > 99) to this if (CriticalDamage > 1) That would then give you a 99% chance for a crit, but this thread has nothing to do with critical hits? He wants 10x hits, like if he hit a 10 now it would actually be a 100.[/quote]^ thats what i want if i hit a 10 it would say 100 and i dnt got to gom in options and switch it my self i want it automatic and u now how rs it say the hp is 999 beside the minimap thats what i also need

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] health and hits
item.dc:creator: @RuneScapeeer279 RuneScapeeer279

@RuneScapeeer279 wrote:

[quote=“tyyy9, post:9, topic:413234”][quote author=RuneScapeeer279 link=topic=514705.msg3736855#msg3736855 date=1315016434]

Your in luck, sorta this is what I found of it,

public boolean CalculateCriticalDamage(Client c) { int CriticalDamage = Misc.random(100); if (CriticalDamage > 99) return true; else return false;
I’m pretty sure it goes under player.java server sided, but im pretty sure its delta so if you know how to edit code to make it with PI do that, if not find some one smarter than me. Also, i didn’t write this so all i know is its for critical hit, what it does exactly, I wouln’t know, if it works, i wouldn’t know, so if you have problems with it, don’t ask me.
[/quote]Thats from Uncalled’s critical hit system, and It has nothing to do with 10x hits, that is part of the system he made so you have a 1% chance of dealing double damage.

Yes but there is a way to edit it to give 99% chance of critical hit[/quote] Yes, change if (CriticalDamage > 99) to this if (CriticalDamage > 1) That would then give you a 99% chance for a crit, but this thread has nothing to do with critical hits? He wants 10x hits, like if he hit a 10 now it would actually be a 100.
